Class: Chart

insight. Chart

new insight.Chart(name, element)

The Chart class is the element in which series and axes are drawn
Name Type Description
name string A uniquely identifying name for this chart
element string The css selector identifying the div container that the chart will be drawn in. '#columnChart' for example.

Methods

staticinsight.Chart.this.seriesChanged(series)

Empty event handler that is overridden by any listeners who want to know when this Chart's series change
Name Type Description
series insight.Series[] An array of insight.Series belonging to this Chart

#this.addXAxis(axis){this}

Add a new x-axis to the chart.
Name Type Description
axis Axis optional The x-axis to add.

#this.addYAxis(axis){this}

Add a new y-axis to the chart.
Name Type Description
axis Axis optional The y-axis to add.

#this.height(){Number}

The height of the chart element, measured in pixels.
Returns:
The current height of the chart.

#this.height(newHeight){this}

Sets the height of the chart element, measured in pixels.
Name Type Description
newHeight Number The new height of the chart, measured in pixels.

#this.legend(){Legend}

The legend to draw on this chart.
Returns:
The current legend drawn on the chart.

#this.legend(newLegend){this}

Sets the legend to draw on this chart.
Name Type Description
newLegend Legend The new legend to draw on the chart.

#this.margin(){object}

The margins to use around the chart (top, bottom, left, right), each measured in pixels.
Returns:
The current margins of the chart.

#this.margin(margins){this}

Sets the margins to use around the chart (top, bottom, left, right), each measured in pixels.
Name Type Description
margins object The new margins to use around the chart.

#this.maxWidth(){Number}

The maximum width of the chart element, measured in pixels.
Returns:
The maximum width of the chart.

#this.maxWidth(newMaxWidth){this}

Sets the maximum width of the chart element, measured in pixels.
Name Type Description
newMaxWidth Number The new maximum width of the chart, measured in pixels.

#this.minWidth(){Number}

The minimum width of the chart element, measured in pixels.
Returns:
The minimum width of the chart.

#this.minWidth(newMinWidth){this}

Sets the minimum width of the chart element, measured in pixels.
Name Type Description
newMinWidth Number The new minimum width of the chart, measured in pixels.

#this.series(){Series[]}

The series to draw on this chart.
Returns:
The current series drawn on the chart.

#this.series(newSeries){this}

Sets the series to draw on this chart.
Name Type Description
newSeries Series[] The new series to draw on the chart.

#this.title(){String}

The title of the chart.
Returns:
The title of the chart.

#this.title(chartTitle){this}

Sets the title of the chart.
Name Type Description
chartTitle String The new title of the chart.

#this.width(){Number}

The width of the chart element, measured in pixels.
Returns:
The current width of the chart.

#this.width(newWidth, dontSetMax){this}

Sets the width of the chart element, measured in pixels.
Name Type Description
newWidth Number The new width of the chart.
dontSetMax Boolean If falsey then the maxWidth of the chart will also be set to newWidth.

#this.xAxes(){Axis[]}

All of the x-axes on the chart.
Returns:
The current x-axes of the chart.

Sets the x-axes on the chart.
Name Type Description
newXAxes Axis[] The new x-axes to draw on the chart.

The primary x-axis on the chart.

Sets the primary x-axis on the chart.
Name Type Description
xAxis Axis The new primary x-axis of the chart.

All of the y-axes on the chart.

Enable zooming for an axis on this chart
